page.title: 04LIFE-STYLES (3) FASHION
page.content: MOST PEOPLE, BOTH BOYS AND GIRLS, LIKE TO WEAR JEANS AND SWEATSHIRTS AS THEIR EVERYDAY CLOTHES. THEY ARE BOTH WARM AND COMFORTABLE. NOW THAT SUMMER IS HERE LIGHT COLOURS FOR GIRLS ARE VERY FASHIONABLE,FOR EXAMPLE A LEMON CAT-SUIT WHICH IS A PAIR OF COTTON PANTS JOINED WITH A BLOUSE OR A THIN LINED PINK JACKET AND A PALE BLUE BACK-LESS BLOUSE, WHEREAS BOYS LIKE TO WEAR THEIR TROUSERS AND PLAIN T-SHIRTS. IN THE EARLY 1900'S SOME WOMEN HAD THEIR WAISTS AROUND 12", WHICH IS LESS THAN HALF THE AVERAGE WOMAN'S WAIST TODAY. ALL WOMEN ARE PARTICULAR ABOUT THE CLOTHES THEY WEAR. ARE THEY TOO OLD-FASHIONED? IS MY BLOUSE CREASED? ALL WOMEN ARE FASHION CONSCIOUS BUT YOUNG MEN DO NOT APPEAR TO WORRY TOO MUCH ABOUT HOW THEY LOOK!
